1.0.0.name: wordpress/wp-social-feedback
1.0.0.description:
WP Social Feedback is a plugin that allows your users to submit feedback, view what other users have submitted and vote on other feedback submissions. There are many externally hosted solutions that do this for free, but don't offer much in the way of features, branding or customization. So we decided to write a plugin that might solve this problem but we also wanted something that we might actually use. Essentially, we also need an easy to use feedback system that will help us decide which features are most interesting to our users.

Features

  • Registered users can submit feedback
  • Registered user comments per feedback entry
  • Users can vote on the feedback they like the most
  • Feedback can be displayed and sorted by date, popularity and votes
  • Integration by Shortcode
  • jQuery UI Theme support
  • Customization via templates

Support and feedback: http
